[14] [18] dushkara kandu satan thulin wasara nawayak thisse thama piya wisin sanyuktha kerunu yuddha hamudawe aagnyapathi thanathurehi wada bhara gath (karthajeniyanu senet manthrana sabhawa wisin parakriya lesin anumatha kerunu [18]) hanibal prakashayata path kale, ithaliya thuladi romayata erehiwa yuddha wadi ehidi eya parajaya kirimehi thama piyag salasumehi palamuwana aramuna wu ayibiriyanu ardhadwipaya dinaganimehi thama piyage wyapruthiya sakshath kota awasan kirimata thama katayuthu karana bawaya.
lankawata erehiwa bedumwadaya pathurapu sanwidhanawala thahanama iwath karala yayi hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasuweya.
jan man senpathiya manchuwarunta erehiwa satan kala da, eya walakwimata apohosath wiya.
